doc: Used to specify the sorting method to be applyed to the recently used resource list.

members.doc: Do not sort the returned list of recently used resources.
members.name: none

members.doc: Sort the returned list with the most recently used items first.
members.name: mru

members.doc: Sort the returned list with the least recently used items first.
members.name: lru

members.doc: Sort the returned list using a custom sorting function passed using .
members.name: custom

name: RecentSortType
